name: 2key-ratchet
description: `2key-ratchet` is an implementation of a Double Ratchet protocol and X3DH in TypeScript utilizing WebCrypto.

scripts.pub: npm version patch && npm publish && git push
scripts.sync: git ac && git pull --rebase && git push
scripts.watch: watch 'npm run coveragehtml' lib/ src/ test/
scripts.predev: if [ ! -f coverage/index.html ]; then mkdir coverage; cp .waiting.html coverage/index.html; fi

author: PeculiarVentures
